  • Reference

    Spanish Presidents' Inaugural Speeches

    spa.inaugural.Rd

    This dataset contains 15 Inaugural Speeches from 1979 to 2020.

    Usage

    spa.inaugural

    Format

    a data.frame object with the following variables:

    • doc_id character; Document ID

    • text character; Text of the inaugural speech

    • President character; Name of the President who gave the speech

    • Legislature numeric; The number of the legislature

    Source

    Moncloa.

    Examples

    # some operations on the corpus
summary(spa.inaugural)
#>     doc_id              text            President          Legislature  
#>  Length:15          Length:15          Length:15          Min.   : 1.0  
#>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.: 3.5  
#>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median : 7.0  
#>                                                           Mean   : 7.0  
#>                                                           3rd Qu.:10.5  
#>                                                           Max.   :14.0  
spa.inaugural
#>          doc_id
#> 1        Suárez
#> 2  Calvo Sotelo
#> 3    González I
#> 4   González II
#> 5  González III
#> 6   González IV
#> 7       Aznar I
#> 8      Aznar II
#> 9    Zapatero I
#> 10  Zapatero II
#> 11      Rajoy I
#> 12     Rajoy II
#> 13    Rajoy III
#> 14    Sánchez I
